Title: Relates to an expedited non-payment procedure for owner occupied dwellings with 3 or fewer units
Summary: Establishes an expedited non-payment procedure for owner occupied dwellings with 3 or fewer units in NYC instructing housing judges to render a decision within 45 days of filing.
LawSection: New York City Civil Court Act
LawCode: Amd ยง110, NYC Civ Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the New York city civil court act, in relation to the establishment of an expedited non-payment procedure for landlords who own and occupy a dwelling of three or fewer units
